summary: The head of a major cosmetics company experiments on herself with a youth formula made from royal jelly extracted from wasps, but the formula's side effects have deadly consequences.
cast: Susan Cabot|Anthony Eisley|Barboura Morris|William Roerick|Michael Mark|Frank Gerstle|Bruno VeSota|Roy Gordon|Carolyn Hughes|Lynn Cartwright|Frank Wolff|Lani Mars|Philip Barry|Gene Corman|Roger Corman|Aron Kincaid
title: La mujer avispa
